ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR(ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Discard'), ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Done') , ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Re-Closed') , ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Tech Issue-SR Assigned')), ISBLANK( Product_Number__c), $RecordType.Name = 'Technical Issue',$Profile.Name != 'Portal API User - RFQ (US)', $Profile.Name !='Portal API User RO Automation', $Profile.Name !='Portal API User - RFQ', $Profile.Name !='Portal API User - Self-Registration', $Profile.Name !='Portal Interfaces App User', $Profile.Name !='Portal User - Self-Registration', $Profile.Name !='Portal Hon Adminstrator', $Profile.Name !='Portal API User - MCORE',$Profile.Name !='DeniedPartyScreening APIUser', $User.Id !='005300000042rPL',$User.Id != '005a0000007vvzm' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Case cannot be closed if Product Number is Blank
